channel.title: I won as merc but my contract lost lol
channel.description:
I was contracted to an Inquisitor that survived to the end of the game so I won however he lost because Sorcerer did too haha
Is this intended or ??

item.title: I won as merc but my contract lost lol
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.source: I won as merc but my contract lost lol

item.title: I won as merc but my contract lost lol
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
Yes, that’s how it works. The Inquisitor has to kill the Sorcerer before they eliminate all the BD.

The only way around this would be to make it so the Inquisitor blocks the game from ending if the Sorcerer is alive, and at that point you might as well make them a BD role.

So basically, what happened fit the rules. Inquisitors have to kill the Sorcerer before the game ends, and they failed to do so; while you just have to keep your target alive, even if they don’t win. It’s even theoretically possible for a merc to end up with a second contract to a Fool and win by keeping them from getting lynched.

Read full topic
item.source: I won as merc but my contract lost lol

item.title: I won as merc but my contract lost lol
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Seems entirely legit to me. Your only responsibility is that your contract doesn’t die. You succeeded. His only responsibility is that the sorc dies… he did not succeed. Sorc’s job is to eliminate all the BD, which I assume he did.

Read full topic
